name: Soundless Satisfaction
description: When used, all allies' Basic ATK DMG dealt in the next battle increases by 45% and Skill DMG dealt decreases by 12%.
story:
People might be more inclined to please others than themselves. However, my dear friend, I still hope you can play a song for yourself, a song unbeknownst to all and unheard by another's ear. Then, laugh out loud â€” as the audience, as well as the performer.

"Life is like a grand soliloquy."
